alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Monroe; Ontario (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:10AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM EDT FOR LIVINGSTON...SOUTH CENTRAL MONROE AND SOUTHWESTERN ONTARIO COUNTIES... At 110 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Geneseo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Geneseo, Dansville, Letchworth State Park, Avon, Mount Morris, Honeoye Falls, Conesus, Lima, Naples and Hemlock. This includes Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 10. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
